channel.title: Ppl new hack programm arrived? read@@!
channel.description:
ppl its in my country 9;26 am now and in most of your countrys its 3;26 last night (your morning) i was sleeping and pc was on and server was on there came a guy called mod angel my mods banned him and he came back with mod mayhem he said he was hidden admin! hes not he made himself but in folders he has no rights 0 but he banned ppl and he could hack passwords how did he do that? ppl help me or if u first time hearing this be awered this was his ip c-69-254-1-170.hsd1.ga.comcast.net [ACCOUNT] character-username = Mod Mayham character-password = joseph1
good luck :confused: erwin

item.title: Ppl new hack programm arrived? read@@!
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Jeremy368, post:13, topic:252215”]I dont think there are any “cheat clients” as you cant modify anything on the server simply because its on the server not the client. and that is why no one can hack runescape. you would have to hack the computer(s) that are hosting RS.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2008, 10:33:15 am[/size][hr][quote author=Goth Wolf link=topic=333108.msg2596882#msg2596882 date=1230024931]
Thats why you should add a pass hasher (Encrypter) Most commands can’t decode it exspecially if you code it yourself. well if it was he was using a pass getting command
[/quote]
I am interested about this pass hasher Can some one tell me more about this ?[/quote]You can make a cheat client for private servers that sends fake packets, as many people have done before, but you can’t on real runescape because afaik it doesn’t allow fake packets.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I dont think there are any “cheat clients” as you cant modify anything on the server simply because its on the server not the client. and that is why no one can hack runescape. you would have to hack the computer(s) that are hosting RS.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2008, 10:33:15 am[/size][hr][quote=“Goth Wolf, post:9, topic:252215”]Thats why you should add a pass hasher (Encrypter) Most commands can’t decode it exspecially if you code it yourself. well if it was he was using a pass getting command[/quote]
I am interested about this pass hasher Can some one tell me more about this ?

item.title: Ppl new hack programm arrived? read@@!
item.dc:creator: @zzzzzzzzzz zzzzzzzzzz
item.description:
@zzzzzzzzzz wrote:

It is possibly he found a flaw in the base that had accounts named with hidden rights=2 or =3 and used a command to get passes and came in as an hidden admin this was also in another server where if you where named “mod greg” playerrights=1 withoug it being in ur char file or data files idk how it was added but it is a flaw only way to fix it is to is to find it in ur files.

Read full topic
